item.title: CVE-2021-26858 Exchange Exploitation
item.description: Detects possible successful exploitation for vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26858 by looking for | creation of non-standard files on disk by Exchange Serverâ€™s Unified Messaging service | which could indicate dropping web shells or other malicious content
